sample.name: spiderchartcomponent
sample.title: JFreeChart Spider Chart Component Sample
sample.description: Shows how a JFreeChart spider chart component can be included in reports.

feature.name: spiderchartcomponent
feature.title: Implementing Custom Components to Embed Third Party Visualisation Tools (JFreeChart Library)
feature.description: How to implement a custom component to wrap spider charts rendered by the JFreeChart library.
